mapper.select: SELECT g.game_code, g.member_code, m.name, c.member_code as challenger_code, cm.name as challenger_name FROM game g JOIN challenger c ON g.game_code=#{game_code} AND c.state=1 AND g.game_code = c.game_code JOIN member m ON g.member_code = m.member_code JOIN member cm ON c.member_code = cm.member_code
